name: hilims

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, ccom(cno, cmv))
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, ccom(cno, cmv))
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c1))
-| wceq(cva, cfv(cpv, c1))
-| wceq(csm, cfv(cns, c1))
-| wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c1))
-| wcel(c1, cnv)
body.pretty:
⊢ c1 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
⊣ ~H =(BaseSet ` c1)
⊣ +h =(+v ` c1)
⊣ .h =(.sOLD ` c1)
⊣ .ih =(.iOLD ` c1)
⊣ c1 ∈ NrmCVec

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, ccom(cno, cmv))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c1))
-| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c1))
-| wceq(cva, cfv(cpv, c1))
-| wceq(csm, cfv(cns, c1))
-| wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c1))
-| wcel(c1, cnv)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(normh ∘ -h)
⊣ c0 =(IndMet ` c1)
⊣ ~H =(BaseSet ` c1)
⊣ +h =(+v ` c1)
⊣ .h =(.sOLD ` c1)
⊣ .ih =(.iOLD ` c1)
⊣ c1 ∈ NrmCVec

comment: Hilbert space distance metric. (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
